original_text: Some of the Pharisees who were there with him heard this. They asked Jesus, ‘Do you mean that we are also blind?’
korean_text: 바리새인 중에 예수와 함께 있던 자들이 이 말씀을 듣고 이르되 우리도 맹인인가

sentences.original_text: Some of the Pharisees who were there with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 바리새인 중 몇 사람이

sentences.original_text: 'Do you mean that we are also blind?'
